data.thought:
S99|I|S98|MENTAL MODELS tool as proto-IMAGINATION organ:

Thoughtbox already has mental_models component. This provides:
- Conceptual frameworks
- Reasoning templates
- Analytical lenses

This is like... cognitive VOCABULARY. Pre-built thinking structures.

Extension toward imagination:
- Scenario generation based on models
- Counterfactual reasoning support
- Simulation of outcomes

Mental models + Thoughtbox = Structured imagination.

'If I apply model X to situation Y, what happens?' Can reason through hypotheticals with framework support.

This is how human imagination works too - we use internalized models to simulate possibilities.

Agent imagination = model-guided thought experiments, recorded in Thoughtbox for examination.
